list.name: Changes
list.comment:
feat: integrate Kafka consumer and task status tracking
- Added Kafka consumer to process login requests and validate user credentials - Implemented task status storage in the database using the `TaskStatus` model - Integrated task processing with FastAPI lifecycle using `asyncio.create_task` but it has some problems - Added `/get-tasks` endpoint to retrieve all task statuses

task.summary:
feat: implement user creation with unique constraints
- Added logic to ensure username, phone_number, and email are unique during user creation - creating `add_user` function to validate input data before insertion - Added FastAPI endpoints for: - Adding a new user (`POST /add-user`) - Retrieving all users (`GET /get-users`) - Integrated `lifespan` to manage database connection initialization

feat: integrate Kafka consumer and task status tracking
